files.README.md:
# dotfiles

```
git clone git@github.com:ykpythemind/dotfiles.git ~/dotfiles
cd ~/dotfiles
```

homebrew を入れる

```
/bin/bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install.sh)"
cd ~/dotfiles
brew bundle
```

init script

```
sh ./init.sh
```

## zsh

### Setup

Mac OS

```
sudo vim /etc/shells # `brew --prefix zsh` の結果を追加
chsh -s `brew --prefix zsh`
```

## 他

- Mac app
  - https://scrapbox.io/ykpythemind/Mac%E3%81%AB%E5%85%A5%E3%82%8C%E3%81%A6%E3%82%8B%E3%82%A2%E3%83%97%E3%83%AA
- font
  - nerd font
    - brew tap homebrew/cask-fonts
    - brew install --cask font-hack-nerd-font
  - SF Mono https://developer.apple.com/fonts/
  - Cica https://github.com/miiton/Cica
files.plugins/ykpythemind-skills/README.md:
```
  To verify locally, you can run:
  claude --plugin-dir ./plugins/ykpythemind-skills
  claude plugin validate .

  After pushing, others can install with:  
  /plugin marketplace add ykpythemind/dotfiles  
  /plugin install ykpythemind-skills@ykpythemind-skills
```
